title: A special religious ceremony to bless the country and the historic victory of President Rajapaksa at Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara
content: Onlanka News – By Nethmi Páramitha – Pix by: Thackshila Udage Submitted by Janaka Alahapperuma On the occasion of celebrating Sri Lanka’s 62nd Independence Day, a religious ceremony was organised to invoke blessings for the country, the nation, the newly re-elected president Mahinda Rajapaksa and Ranaviruwo, at the Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara premises on 14th…
